lines.text: (How to Manufacture Your Group) "Find yourself four kids. Make sure they hate eachother. Make sure they can't play."

to swindle ours way to the top of the rock and roll industry. It was a plan that within 2 years was bring us close on a million pounds, and a household name as the most notorious, filthy, disgusting, dirtiest rock and roll band in your bloody world.
The Sex Pistols - a walking abortion. The Sex Pistols are nothing but a bunch of irresponsible half-dead lumps. But the best are born.
I was only in it for the birds after the show.
they have a sort of negative Midas touch - everything they touch turns to shit!
And now, the end is near, and so I face- the final curtain. Ha ha ha!

cultivate hatred; it is your greatest asset. Here at home, create a tour that no one can turn up to. Throw the groups name away, and leave a question mark in its place. Create confusion. The Sex Pistols made sure that they failed to turn up at certain venues. Reading false rumours wherever they could.
We're better than anyone, ain't we? Except for The Eagles; The Eagles are better than us.
